website_summaries.verdict: Powerful formula and good spray range make this an excellent bear deterrent.
pros: Strong formula is released in a burst that can't be ignored
cons: Can leak if left in extreme heat
and trigger can be difficult to control in an attack

customer_reviews.title: Saw a stray Pit Bull eating some garbage. We stopped - it saw us - then ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well on a charging Pit Bull. Was on my bike while my young son was out for a run. Saw a stray Pit Bull eating some garbage. We stopped - it saw us - then charged. I had this out and ready (i mounted it to the bike). I shot two short bursts as it charged us and it stopped it INSTANTLY - it turned around went the other way coughing. I don't want to think what would have happened had we not had this.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M.

customer_reviews.title: Live in Montana and walk the mountains with 4 dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: Live in Montana and walk the mountains with 4 dogs - if I leave this behind by accident I feel vulnerable! Learned the safety clip is valuable after having another one go off inside of my truck - UNPLANNED! I also carry a walking stick, a coast guard air horn can, and a whistle - dogs have shock collars after my eldest boy charged a grizzly bear and I couldn't get him back. He's OK though! LOL If you live in an area with wild animals this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: JodiLeck

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty intense, so just be really careful when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Tested it out on a tree to make sure I knew how it works and i ran away immediately so I didn't inhale any and about 3 minutes later, my throat was itchy, my eyes were watering, and I couldn't stop coughing. I got a second wind maybe after another 5 minutes and thought I was going to throw up. It's pretty intense, so just be really careful when you test it out. I feel pretty safe with that though if I were to run into a bear.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Gromling

customer_reviews.title: Critters (etc.) Beware
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and expels a high velocity stream of noxious spew. Have not tried it on a bear (thankfully) but an aggressive raccoon hightailed it mighty fast after one blast. Also used it to successfully treat an unwanted homeless burrow at the back of my property.
customer_reviews.author: John Q. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it would be good for a dangerous situation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for family member a few years ago who lives in an area with bears. Fortunately, it has not been needed yet. The 2% CRC is something like double or triple that of law-enforcement issued pepper spray, so testing or using it could be risky if done against the wind. The glow-in-the-dark safety clip stands out well in low light (when it has been exposed to normal light) and the device appears like it would be ready to use rapidly, if a situation ever occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a cross country camping trip that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cross country camping trip that I took last summer. I was more concerned about two-legged wildlife than 4 legged. Having been near someone who accidentally deployed his can, I can speak to the stopping power. We were outdoors in a clearing and 30 feet away, I could barely breathe. I live in bear country but have never had to use it on a bear. All reports say it works well unless you surprise a sow with cubs nearby.
customer_reviews.author: LisaE

customer_reviews.title: A great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully we did not have to use this in Yellowstone or Glacier but it was very reassuring to have it on us! An essential item in many areas. It attaches very easily and isn't cumbersome to hike with.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: ... of free roaming dogs who apparently find bicyclers a favorite snack. I deployed this on a Rottweiler about ...
customer_reviews.text: I carry this on my bicycle as I ride in an area with a lot of free roaming dogs who apparently find bicyclers a favorite snack. I deployed this on a Rottweiler about after a week after I purchased it. It stopped in his tracks and ran back home. I strongly feel that I would have been bitten if I would not have had the spray. I will not ride without this. I easily shoots about 20'. There are about 3 seconds of spray in each can, but a 1/2 second blast is more than sufficient to stop a large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved using it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for that VERY aggressive sheep camp dog that couldn't be brought out of attack mode while we were out 4 wheeling in the mountains of Idaho. It was a delight to use and watch the bewildered look on his face as he stopped dead in his tracks. Gives me a great sense of peace while riding around in bear country. Will be sure to buy a fresh one next year also and don't plan to ever be out without one.
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: A handful of 'hurt'.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the opportunity, thankfully, to use this product for its intended purpose. I have seen video of the spray being used and this is what I want in hand if I run across a bear or an unruly mob.
customer_reviews.author: W. Baumbeck

customer_reviews.title: Think it will work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since the one I bought at Cabela's a few years back has expired. (These have an expiration date stamped on the side.) I tested my last one according to the directions, and did the same to this. Fluid seems to have a orange color to it. Do not get downwind. This stuff is strong. I noticed that there was no cable to keep the red safety attached to the canister. The holes are there, just no cable. So I installed one just incase the safety gets knocked off. I hope I never need to use this stuff, but feel better having it with me.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: but so glad I had it
customer_reviews.text: Did not have to use it, but so glad I had it. While on vacation in Smokey mountains came across a black bear in the distance of the trail we were traveling on. I was comforted knowing I had a reasonable chance to ward it off if it approached me.
customer_reviews.author: ValueHunter

customer_reviews.title: I have four of the portable animal/bear sprayers. Never ...
customer_reviews.text: I have four of the portable animal/bear sprayers. Never have used them but the peace of mind they bring when out hiking is worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: The Facts Man

customer_reviews.title: I loved it bears not so much
customer_reviews.text: live way out off grid and off road, commonly seen critters include Bears, cougars, skunks elk, deer turkey's, badgers, on occasion if the bears don't get a nose full they get nosey as winter starts in, hungry I guess, but a shot of this in their direction keeps them in the deep woods and makes us feel safer
customer_reviews.author: real talk

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected. "Antifa-Medicine" for the 'just in case' senario.
customer_reviews.text: I studied the reviews carefully. Bear spray is the ONLY way to go. This one got the best ratings overall.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: UDAP is the best
customer_reviews.text: This bear spray is easy to use (when tested) and has a safety to prevent accidental discharge. It's small enough to be easily handled and big enough to find quickly. It has an informative pamphlet with it that tells about bears and what to do when encountering one, as well as two testimonials about the spray. I sure felt a lot safer having it at camp and on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Nissanka Goonetilleke

customer_reviews.title: keeping the bears and vampires away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same brand over 10 years ago and noticed the expiration date had come and gone, so I bought another one. I went out in the woods and tested the old one to see if there was any vitality to it. It worked fine too. I think this company knows its stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dunroven

customer_reviews.title: but it was nice to have on my trip to Yellowstone
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I didn't have to use this...but it was nice to have on my trip to Yellowstone, Glacier, and Teton just in case. The carry case was easy to strap on my pack.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily for bears but for the off chance that some dumba $$ tries something stupid. Perfect size for your hand
customer_reviews.text: I thought it said Hair Spray. ... I keep it handy in my glove compartment. Not necessarily for bears but for the off chance that some dumba $$ tries something stupid. Perfect size for your hand. Cool little bag to carry it for walks etc
customer_reviews.author: Code3Av

customer_reviews.title: No bear showed up, so i suppose they can ...
customer_reviews.text: No bear showed up, so i suppose they can smell the contents in the can??? Well built and light enough to carry around all day
customer_reviews.author: LivermoreShasta

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two cans as a replacement for expired cans. My expired cans fired an exceptionally long distance when emptied.An essential product to pack when hiking, ATVing, or camping in bear country.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Shook

customer_reviews.title: I feel better with it
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't had to use this spray on bears or anything else, I trust the product due to all the testemonials. I walk sometimes in areas with black bears, not usually a problem for people, but attacks happen. Better to be safe!
customer_reviews.author: J. House

customer_reviews.title: I feel much better going into the wilderness with bear spray
customer_reviews.text: I feel much better going into the wilderness with bear spray. For us, this is a must have. Shipping wasn't as quick as expected, but we are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: A Carr

customer_reviews.title: Have no idea if it works; thank goodness.
customer_reviews.text: I can not say if it works or not (thank goodness) but it made the trek up and down the trails much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jbroham

customer_reviews.title: I tested this one time in the yard, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I tested this one time in the yard, and it seemed to work. Let's hope I never need it on a trail.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire Tinted

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind, easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: I'm up in Alaska and adventure travel all over. I hunt, fish, and camp and absolutely must have bear spray handy. I have two, keep one in each of my cars and grab them whenever I'm ready to venture outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: synergy58

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and Amazon had the best price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and Amazon had the best price!!! Very comfortable to carry, I take it with me when I hike in the wilderness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to use by outdoorsman
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to use by outdoorsmen when we did a multi-week camping trip through the pacific northwest last summer. I would not want to be in the woods without it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Crackers

customer_reviews.title: ... use it but the case it comes with is great and I like the bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually had to use it but the case it comes with is great and I like the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Expired 2009
customer_reviews.text: The can I had expired in 2009. This Yr. 2014 I wondered if it would work. It did and slowly it drifted toward the house. That stuff is stronger than strong. It sprayed the distance it was suppose to. I read another review which said when left in the hot car in summer it leaked. Mine did not. It was in the car every summer and winter for years. Guess I was lucky?
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn Rae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I feel a lot better in the woods with this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Water Walking

customer_reviews.title: Though I cannot give a review of the actual chemical because fortunately I did not have a situation where I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bear spray for a 2 week trip my family was going on in Yellowstone National Park back in June. Though I cannot give a review of the actual chemical because fortunately I did not have a situation where I had to use it I can say that just knowing that it was on my side put my mind at ease. It seems to be a very sturdy well made can that comes with a case that holds the bottle firmly and can attach to your belt or backpack and it is so light that you forget it's there. This must be a popular brand because the other backpackers I saw also had the UDAP brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your back country hikes.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, powerful protection. Be sure to have it with you on your belt or in a side cargo pocket in easy reach--not in your pack. This is not a replacement for common sense, though. Be aware of your surroundings, don't hike alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne in OC

customer_reviews.title: It feels good walking down a trail having this
customer_reviews.text: For bears or people I'm ready. It feels good walking down a trail having this. Hope I never need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: ee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Felt better having this larger bear spray in the wilderness for 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie dillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item is as described, and the price is fair.
customer_reviews.author: THIS IS SPARTA !!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice package and product
customer_reviews.text: Nice package and product. Good for home defense. Figure if it can deter a bear... it will certainly mess up a human or a crowd if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! Sure enough we had a bear come ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Sure enough we had a bear come through our camp and though we didn't need to use the UDAP bear spray I felt totally confident after testing it prior to the encounter that it would have definitely deterred the bear away from us.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I did have bear coming in near my deer blind, wile bow hunting . Thank god I never had to use it . But it's nice to have with you in bear Territory
customer_reviews.author: Rao

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for Mace.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on an episode of Doomsday Preppers: "Escape from New York". Since it's so hard to own a gun in New York the prepper specialist suggested this to carry with during a bug out. We can't have mace in California but you can own Bear spray. LOL I attached it to the side of my wife's BOB with the holster that came with it. It slides in and out of the holster nicely. Haven't tried spraying it yet but from the you tube video's it looks like it will more than do the job.
customer_reviews.author: H2doughboy

customer_reviews.title: very convenient to carry
customer_reviews.text: bought the smaller size and the smaller size is convenient to carry, nice holder w/belt loop or wrist loop. Delivered timely. Bought for big dog deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: LADONNA

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: OK technically I haven't actually encountered a bear so I haven't used the product yet. That being said, I did some research after my Eagle Scout boyfriend and a troop of boy scouts had a bear walk into camp last fall (it wasn't bear country and food was hung properly regardless). Bear spray has been shown to be a highly effective bear deterrent and a win/win since humans aren't harmed and the bear isn't killed. UDAP has the maximum concentration (2%) of capsaicin allowed so I feel a lot better knowing bear spray is now part of my boyfriend's camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: jkingsgate

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I haven't had to use this product yet but it sure gave me a sense of security tromping around in the woods. Looks like it will do the job when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Zaugg

customer_reviews.title: Needed for loose dogs.
customer_reviews.text: After being attacked by two large dogs in the neighborhood, I really needed this pepper spray then. Although I have yet to try it out, I'm glad to have it now for any future attacks. One criticsm: the Amazon ad said it contained 7 seconds worth of continuous spray, but the bottle itself says it contains only 4 seconds of spray. Amazon needs to correct its ad. Price is rather high for only 4 seconds of spray.
customer_reviews.author: Proud to Speak English

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff
customer_reviews.text: Last year, my sister and I were planning our hike to Table Mountain, Wyoming. This hike goes right through prime bear country. We did a lot of research online (multiple hiking/hunting/outdoors sites) as far as bear spray, and came to the conclusion that UDAP was THE BEST. I bought two 7.9oz canisters. While we never had to use it, I felt well prepared if we did have a run in with a bear.
customer_reviews.author: P. Von Bargen

customer_reviews.title: The Best With the Highest Concentration
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd product from UDAP and I love the quality of the formula ( the highest concentration ) and the peace of mind knowing this is the top of the line in pepper sprays for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Strong stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is strong. My 10 year old sprayed a tiny amount in the garage while packing for a backpacking trip. It was miserable. I couldn't image if you took a shot right to the face.
customer_reviews.author: ANoble

customer_reviews.title: You never hope you have to use. But ever ...
customer_reviews.text: You never hope you have to use. But ever I go camping in bear country I make sure everyone with me have this Bear Spray. I purposely buy this brand because this was developed by a survivor of a bear attack..
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for self defense on walks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in case a dog or human attacks me on a walk. I tried it out really quick just so I would know how to use it. It is very powerful and shoots very far. I feel so much safer now on my walks and don't feel that I need to pay for a gym membership to feel safe while exercising. I love this and when my old one expires, I will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne F. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  5 seconds for $40?  Hmmm....
customer_reviews.text: Lasts 5 seconds. So make sure you get your $40 worth. Will probably shop around a bit on my replacement order.
customer_reviews.author: MMA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great service, competitive price and good delivery. I advise everybody to use it. I plan to use it again and recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: roman

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem with a neighbor's dog that was allowed ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with a neighbor's dog that was allowed to run free. Threatened my wife and challenged me. One spray and the dog steers well clear of us.
customer_reviews.author: HLMorin

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my wife to take running w/ ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to take running w/ her as I know it works well on dogs and people. We shoot a test shot from time to time and it always performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Mojave702

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works on aggressive dogs while biking, just make sure the wind isnt against your back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Happily, I did not need to use the bear spray, but gave it a test spray (as recommended) and it shot far and fast. Comes with holder that fit on utility belt.
customer_reviews.author: LZ CO

customer_reviews.title: fear factor 9
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet , just holding it you know it packs a punch ,from what I have seen on demonstrations on youtube, it looks very intimidating for man or beast,for those who don't wish to own firearms this might be the ticket for you..
customer_reviews.author: dresden67

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm Loaded for Bear!
customer_reviews.text: Hven't had to use it yet but my confidence is up when I have it. That's good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Runatem

customer_reviews.title: ... had to use it yet so it should work great. got my finger s crossed
customer_reviews.text: have not had to use it yet so it should work great. got my finger s crossed ..
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Weaker than human mace...no distance factor.
customer_reviews.text: This spray is supposed to be the king of sprays, but I purchased 2 largest size bottles and they only spray about 5 to 10 feet realistically even down wind. They are not the "blasters" I thought they would be. Not to mention these are much less stronger than human mace. There is only a small percent of the burning stuff. I was shocked by this. Dunno. I know UDAP is the go to but Im going elsewhere. Look at riot control sprays instead maybe. With a bear I want something with serious spray force and distance not a fogger. Look at udap distance YouTube video by this one guy..not the usual commercial.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the shipper was excellent. Very fast. The product itself I won't be trying on myself or others but from the careful packaging & accompanying Bear Safety Tips Booklet, I feel that this is a quality item. Udap really spent a lot of time & money to produce the booklet. I believe that they expended the same amount of care in producing the product. And no, you cannont bring it with you when traveling by airplane.
customer_reviews.author: MGH

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say until/when I ever need to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say until/when I ever need to use it. However, I'd rather have it as to not have it
customer_reviews.author: arnold f. guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good thing to have on mountain trips.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to the mountains. Thankfully I didn't have to use it on a bear. The holster works fine as I carried it on my belt with no shifting or problems at all. This is the second UDAP Bear Spray I have purchased. My son requisitioned my first one to use on nighttime geocaching trips.
customer_reviews.author: Olddabbler

customer_reviews.title: Really spews a powerful cloud
customer_reviews.text: Shoots a strong stream developing into cloud at 20ft.Very irritating.Havent used it on bear yet but I bet it would work.It got me standing 20 ft away!
customer_reviews.author: victor bagnato

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn't hurt to get a practice can so as not to waste the real thing
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to rate without having defended myself against a charging bear :) but I do have a couple comments that may help others. 1) When I tried what was supposed to be a split second test spray it turned in to about 2 seconds (half of this size can). I was expecting the trigger to automatically return to the off position but you have to manually turn it off (push the front down). 2) It has a bit more "kick" than I expected. It wouldn't hurt to get a practice can so as not to waste the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great defense
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before in Alaska and thankfully have not had to use it but know I friend that had to and it literally saved the family. Very effective and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: EchelonGirl7

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: has kept all the bears away have not used yet
customer_reviews.author: donald Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If the bear stops I will give it a five.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: UDAP'S Premium Bear Spay w / Hip Holster 7.9 OZ.
customer_reviews.text: UDAP'S Premium Bear Spay w / Hip Holster 7.9 OZ. is just the size you need, not 13 OZ. This will come in handy for hiking and walking the dog since bears are around here.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of my survival gear. I think this is a must have in your bugout bag. The can is fairly big, but small enough to fit on the side of your backpack just incase you need it. we are going camping in a couple of months and there are a lot of bear around, so that's why I purchased this spray.
customer_reviews.author: George C

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it
customer_reviews.text: We carry the bear spray only when on long hikes in bear country but how does one know if this product is effective until you have to use it? Luckily we have not had to "use" the bear spray.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 but have not had the moment to use it so can not vouch for its effectivness. Came with a great guide on bear saftey and the product itself seems very user friendly. Shipping from this buyer was also fast which was great because I needed it before my next camping trip and arrived in plenty of time.
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: Bear Spray
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep away wild animals and bill collectors. So far worth the investment. To date I have not been attacked by any animals and I'm caught up on all my bills.
customer_reviews.author: Cableczar

customer_reviews.title: Lucky that I never had to use it
customer_reviews.text: If I don't use it cannot tell. did not run into any bears to try it on and if I did I would hope it worked or I would not be able to rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Bear spay?
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this works because I haven't used it yet! If I see a bear and it saves my life, I will give it 5 stars. If I see a bear and it doesn't work, I won't be writing a review will I?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Long

customer_reviews.title: Beats a stick
customer_reviews.text: Item took a while to arrive but still in plenty of time for summer hiking protection. I hope I don't have to use the spray.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Savallisch

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, with instruction, and I hope I don't need it on my trip to Alaska
customer_reviews.author: Willem Van Hulzen

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: Product may be great. Don't know and hope I don't find out. Problem is transport. When you receive this you find out the spray can is not supposed to be exposed to heat. If you carry this in a car, in summer, and leave it when not hiking it will be exposed to heat high enough to cause a problem. SURPRISE, THEY SELL A CONTAINER WHICH SUPPOSEDLY PROTECTS THE PRODUCT FROM EXPLODING. A basic plastic cylinder with foam insulation which sells for a very high 20 to 25 dollars. Don't remember that in the offer.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: You Cannot Return it for Any Reason!!!
customer_reviews.text: The spray arrived in good condition fine, but it was way too big for my wife to use for protection when she went for a walk. I attempted to return it and was informed by Amazon that it cannot be returned. Buyer beware on this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't but this product
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product I saw where it contains only2.0% capsaicin-the one I normally carry has 10%-I can't imagine how this would work on human that well let alone a bear??? I will probably sell it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: xmen

product_meta.title: Udap Bear Spray Safety Orange with Color Griz Guard Holster
product_meta.description: DISPERSES MORE ACTIVE INGREDIENTS IN A SHORTER AMOUNT OF TIME! The Pepper Power Fogger is the most efficient way to dispense large amounts of OC on to a subject in the shortest period of time. The fogger's enhanced range, broad spray pattern and inhalable particle size make it the most effective aerosol tool available to Stop a bear attack. Simply by virtue of its ability to disperse large amounts of OC into the area. Includes exclusive Griz Guard Holster.
feature_bullets: FREE 32 Page UDAP Bear Safety Tips booklet included!
Glow in the Dark Safety Clip with chain attached
Developed by a bear attack survivor
Hottest bear spray available at 2% CRC

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
